thread.title: Broadway's Cirque du Soleil show will star Ruby Lewis
thread.title_full: Broadway's Cirque du Soleil show will star Ruby Lewis

title: Broadway's Cirque du Soleil show will star Ruby Lewis
text: > Entertainment Broadway's Cirque du Soleil show will star Ruby Lewis FILE - In this July 16, 2014 file photo, Ruby Lewis poses during the party for the opening night performance of Queen and Ben Elton's "We Will Rock You" at the Center Theatre Group/Ahmanson Theatre in Los Angeles. Lewis, a native of Tennessee, will make her Broadway debut this spring in “Paramour” with a 38-member company that will build a show about a love triangle with some eye-popping acrobatics. (Photo by Ryan Miller/Invision/AP, File)
